content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
- Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)

### Copper plate factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
- Furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(-18.0, -49.0) and a furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to steam engine and boiler connections
- Ensure that the boiler has a continuous supply of fuel to operate effectively. Check the fuel inventory and refill as necessary.
- Connect steam engines to a valid power source to ensure they operate. Verify that the steam engine is connected to the boiler and that the boiler has water supplied from an offshore pump.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the intended position.

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that all machines requiring power are connected to a power network. Check for any disconnections in the electricity grid and reconnect as necessary.
